net.proteusframework.cms.component.generator

Class XMLRenderer<T extends ContentElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.component.generator.XMLRenderer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer<T>

    public class XMLRenderer<T extends ContentElement>
extends Object
implements Renderer<T>

    Simple renderer that returns content that is Xml. This renderer is specifically written to work with ContentElements that have published content.

    Automatically includes a Link Tag Listener and an Object Tag Listener. This is a renderer and does not know where to get the data. You must set a CmsModelDataSet in setDataSet(CmsModelDataSet) or provide XML data by overriding getXMLContent().

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com), Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • XMLRenderer

        public XMLRenderer(ContentType type)
        Creates a new instance. Uses all Model Data objects for rendering.
        Parameters:
        type - the content type. One of Xml, XHtml, and Html (xhtml actually).

      • XMLRenderer

        public XMLRenderer(ContentType type,
           Collection<? extends Enum> purposes)
        Creates a new instance. Uses only those purposes included.
        Parameters:
        type - the content type. One of Xml, XHtml, and Html (xhtml actually).
        purposes - a set of Model Data purpose(s) to use.

      • addTagListener

        public final boolean addTagListener(net.proteusframework.core.xml.TagListener<?> tl)
        Add a tag listener. The argument will replace all tag listeners that are listening for tag that the argument supports. It is possible for the argument to replace more than one listener. This should only be called prior to parsing / rendering.
        Parameters:
        tl - the tag listener.
        Returns:
        true if the add operation removed an existing TagListener.

      • getNDEs

        public List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> getNDEs()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Get the NDEs needed by the generated content.

        The NDEs should be assembled in the preRenderProcess method. See the class level javadoc for order of method calls. The ProcessChain will gather the NDEs of any Renderers or PageElements that are delegated to.

        Specified by:
        getNDEs in interface Renderer<T extends ContentElement>

      • parse

        public static String parse(String data,
           net.proteusframework.internet.http.Request request,
           net.proteusframework.internet.http.Response response)
                    throws IOException
        Parse the specified data. It is recommended that parse(String, Request, Response, PrintWriter) be used instead if a PrintWriter or suitable Appendable is already available. Also, if you need control over the ContentType , do not use this method.
        Parameters:
        data - the data.
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        Returns:
        the parsed data.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the data cannot be parsed.

      • parseWithRoot

        public static String parseWithRoot(String data,
                   net.proteusframework.internet.http.Request request,
                   net.proteusframework.internet.http.Response response)
                            throws IOException
        Parse the specified data. It is recommended that parse(String, Request, Response, PrintWriter) be used instead if a PrintWriter or suitable Appendable is already available. Also, if you need control over the ContentType , do not use this method. This method wraps the content in a root element that isn't output.
        Parameters:
        data - the data.
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        Returns:
        the parsed data.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the data cannot be parsed.
